Aura Cacia Gentle Cleansing Oil, Unscented

Brand: Aura Cacia

Category: Facial Cleanser

Brand: Aura Cacia

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Organic helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, polyglyceryl-3 polyricinoleate(1), polyglyceryl-2 caprate(1), caprylic/capric triglyceride, prunus amygdalus dulcis (sweet almond) oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, tocopherol (vitamin e), (1)plant derived gentle cleanser.
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Use Restrictions
